Module mesakit.map.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.tiles

Class ZoomLevel

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.tiles.ZoomLevel
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.Stringable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringSource
public class ZoomLevel extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.Stringable
In OSM, zoom level 0 is zoomed out so that the entire world is one tile and zoom level 17 is zoomed in as far as possible with 68 billion tiles. The OSM zoom level can be retrieved with level().

In some Telenav applications, zoom level 0 is zoomed in as far as possible and zoom level 17 is zoomed out as far as possible. The Telenav zoom level can be retrieved with asTelenavZoomLevel().

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
